snippet: In a race that many other Democrats once considered hopeless, Mr. Edwards defeated his opponent, United States Senator David Vitter, by a wide margin on Saturday.
abstract: Democrat John Bel Edwards' underdog campaign for Louisiana governor's seat prevails by significant margin over powerful Republican rival Sen David Vitter; socially-conservative Catholic veteran takes advantage of disarray in usually dominant state's usually dominant Republican Party; pledges to fix state's disastrous finances.
lead_paragraph: In a race that many other Democrats once considered hopeless, Mr. Edwards defeated his opponent, United States Senator David Vitter, by a wide margin on Saturday.

headline.main: Louisiana’s John Bel Edwards Overcame Big Obstacles to Win Governor’s Race
headline.print_headline: Louisiana Democrat Leapt Big Obstacles to Beat Vitter in Governor’s Race
